bill_title: prohibit railcars from being parked on the state-owned rail system for extended periods of time.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit railcars from being parked on the state-owned rail system for extended periods of time. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No railcar may be parked for more than ninety days on any portion of railroad or railroad sidetrack owned by the state without the prior specific permission of the Department of Transportation. The department shall provide for the prompt removal and disposal of any railcar in violation of this section. The department shall establish guidelines, pursuant to § 1-44-28, regarding the parking of railcars on state-owned railway property and to implement the provisions of this section. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
